name.en: Fabrication Practice of Solid-state Light Sources

goal.en: 1、To help students understand the practical features and the applications of solid-state light sources. 2、To widen students’ vision, several co-instructors from the industry will join the class to introduce the practical operations and consideration in the industry. 3、On-site visiting will be arranged to impress students with practical affairs.
goal.ch: 1、提昇學生對固態光源特性與應用之瞭解。 2、部份課程邀請業界人士做實務介紹，並與學生座談，擴展學生的視野。 3、安排企業實地參訪，增進學生對實務的瞭解。

content.en:
1、Fabrication of LEDs
2、Practice of Micro LED
3、Principle and Applications of Optical Sensing Devices
4、Feature Application and Material Design for Packaging
5、Optics Principle and Simulation for LEDs
6、On-site Visiting
content.ch:
1、LED製程
2、Micro LED 實務
3、光感測元件之應用與原理
4、封裝材料設計＆特性應用
5、LED光學原理與模擬實務
6、業界參訪

textbook.en: 1、“III-Nitride Based Light Emitting Diodes and Applications”、Seong ＆ Han ＆ Amano ＆ Morkoc、Springer、2017. 2、“Handbook of Advanced Lighting Technology”、Karlicek ＆ Sun ＆ Zissis ＆ Ma、Springer、2017. 3、“Lighting for Driving”、Boyce、CRC Press、2008. 4、“The Art of Radiometry”、 Palmer ＆ Grant、SPIE、2009.
